titleStmt.title: The dying ladies last farewell to the world: shewing the vanity of things below and the excellency of those above, &c. To the tune of, Sighs and groans.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Right half sheet contains: "Second part to the same tune."
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
